name: DON'T LOOK AT THE SUN
description:
This game was made as a part of the Game By It's Cover Jam 2020. The inspiration for this game came from the piece "don't look at the sun" by Jasmin Mae, found on the 2020 Famicase Exhibition.

THE SUN IS MOVING CLOSER AND CLOSER TO EARTH. THOSE WHO LOOK INTO IT ARE OFFERED EVERYTHING FROM THEIR WILDEST DREAMS. IF THEY LOOK AT IT, THE SUN TAKES THEM.

THE ONLY ONES WHO CAN SAVE THE EARTH FROM ITSELF ARE YOU, A GROUP OF VAMPIRES. DON'T LOOK AT THE SUN, STOP WHO IS RESPONSIBLE, THEN SLINK BACK INTO THE SHADOWS.

In this simple, apocalyptic vampire RPG, a Game Master is given simple parameters to create an apocalyptic scenario for a group of vampires who are charged with saving the world from being enveloped by the sun itself.
